changelog: ## Added
- Added reassuring screen when entering empty passphrase on device.
- Improved ETH send and staking flow.
- Redesigned FIDO2 UI.
## Changed
- Renamed MATIC to POL, following a network upgrade
## Fixed
- Fix persistent word when going to previous word during recovery process.
- Added missing info about remaining shares in super-shamir recovery.
## Added
- Added PIN keyboard animation.
- Added menu entry animation.
- Added screen brightness settings.
## Changed
- Screen transitions and animations were improved and are now smoother.
- Improved precision of PIN validation countdown.
- Improved instruction screens during multi-share recovery process.
- New UI of firmware update.
- Improved share words swiping animation during wallet creation.
## Fixed
- Fixed title sometimes not fitting into result screen.
- Improved touch layer precision.
- Fixed 'More info' screen during multi-share backup creation.
- Fixed title sometimes not fitting into result screen.
- Adjusted detection of swipes: vertical swipes are preferred over horizontal swipes now.

* Added tutorial flow. 
* Added Animated device label on homescreen/lockscreen. 
* Added word counter during wallet creation. 
* Improved change homescreen flow. 
* Improved swipe behavior and animations. 
* Increased Optiga read timeout to avoid spurious RSODs. 
* Fixed swipe back from address QR code screen. 
* Fixed device authenticity check. 
* Removed CoSi functionality.

* Introducing repeated backups. 
* Multi-share backups can now have any number of shares. 
* Added support for Cardano Conway certificates [Universal fw only].
